Reviews.Title: “Hidden treasure”
Reviews.Author: Stefanojay
Reviews.Content: traveling family stay singapore huge nice balcony view golf course relaxing immerse lush garden 3 restaurants real supermarket till 10 pm 3 fantastic swimming pools olympic size bowling alley nice playground drop kid close zoo 20 min orchard street mrt cant wait return singapore stay beautiful resort

Reviews.Title: “Good for relaxing”
Reviews.Author: chenyu11
Reviews.Content: stayed night family reasonable price 200 queen bed single bed beautiful view balcony water pressure supermarket country club convenience free shuttle bus mrt drawback hear voice outside stay bit annoyed

Reviews.Title: “A Relaxing place to stay”
Reviews.Author: W L
Reviews.Content: booked hotel nearest hotel auntie home expectation spacious price reasonable singapore hotels view silent secure definitely singapore drawback wifi payment service didnt spend time hotel hotel facilities hope time enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Spacious rooms”
Reviews.Author: Jameskee
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights hotel previous chap commented golfer bowling alley hotel liked 1 amazing spacious 2 view golf course 3 relaxing getaway didnt 1 breakfast poor singapore standards food paradise 2 sheltered carparks car sauna target practice pigeons days parking 3 4 internet hotel

Reviews.Content: hello hotel short business trip holidays stay 3 night late check flight stay lobby 4 hours getting ready time beautiful golf course people play golf external client dont walk reservoir town center shuttle mrt swimming pool 50 meters nice restaurant chinese sick night main hotel restaurant horrible bedroom nice
